account_id.description: The ID of the Facebook account associated with the video.

ad_breaks.description: Information about ad breaks within the video.

backdated_time.description: The time when the video was backdated.

content_category.description: The category of the video content.

content_tags.description: Tags associated with the video content.

created_time.description: The time when the video was created.

custom_labels.description: Custom labels assigned to the video.

description.description: Description or caption of the video.

embed_html.description: HTML code for embedding the video.

embeddable.description: Flag indicating if the video is embeddable.

format.description: Specifies the format of the video data being fetched.

items.description: Different formats available for the video.

filter.description: Filter applied to the video format.

embed_html.description: HTML code for embedding the video in a specific format.

picture.description: URL of the thumbnail picture for the video format.

is_crosspost_video.description: Flag indicating if the video is a crosspost.

is_crossposting_eligible.description: Flag indicating if the video is eligible for crossposting.

is_episode.description: Flag indicating if the video is an episode of a series.

is_instagram_eligible.description: Flag indicating if the video is eligible for posting on Instagram.

permalink_url.description: URL for accessing the video directly.

post_views.description: Number of views on the video post.

premiere_living_room_status.description: Status of the video premiere in living rooms.

published.description: Flag indicating if the video is published.

scheduled_publish_time.description: Scheduled time for publishing the video.

title.description: Title or name of the video.

universal_video_id.description: Universal unique ID for the video.

updated_time.description: The time when the video was last updated.

views.description: Number of views on the video.
